Package echo.evs.logic

Interface OrganizerLogic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrganizerLogicImpl
    public interface OrganizerLogic
    Defines the interfaces for the Organizer actions

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentUser

        Organizer getCurrentUser()
        Get the current organizer that is logged in
        Returns:
        current organzizer

      • updateOrganizer

        java.lang.String updateOrganizer​(Organizer organizer)
        Update Organizer. Not supported yet.
        Parameters:
        organizer - new Organizer
        Returns:
        uuid of organizer

      • storePoll

        java.lang.String storePoll​(Poll poll)
        Store the poll in the database using the poll dto values. If the poll is new it will create a poll instead. Creates/updates events depending on poll states and changes to start and end date
        Parameters:
        poll - Poll to be stored
        Returns:
        uuid of stored poll

      • deletePoll

        boolean deletePoll​(java.lang.String uuid)
        Deletes a poll based on uuid. It will only consider polls that are owned by the organizer that calls this method. If poll is in state STARTED, VOTING or PUBLISHED a notification mail will be sent to all participants.
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuif of the poll to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if successfully deleted

      • getPoll

        Poll getPoll​(java.lang.String uuid)
        Get poll by uuid. It will only consider polls that are owned by the organizer that calls this methods.
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuid of the poll
        Returns:
        poll dto or null if no poll was found

      • createPoll

        Poll createPoll​(java.lang.String title,
                java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                java.time.LocalDateTime endDate,
                java.lang.String description,
                java.lang.Boolean trackingEnabled,
                java.util.List<Participant> participants,
                java.util.List<Question> questions,
                PollState pollState)
        Creates a poll based on the passed parameters. Resulttoken and votecounter is automatically set to null/0.
        Parameters:
        title - title of poll
        startDate - startDate of poll
        endDate - endDate of poll
        description - desciprion of poll
        trackingEnabled - boolean if tracking is enabled
        participants - list of participants
        questions - list of questions
        pollState - pollState
        Returns:
        Poll dto

      • getPollList

        java.util.List<Poll> getPollList()
        Get list of polls owned by the organizer that calls this method
        Returns:
        list of polls

      • getListOfPollTitle

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getListOfPollTitle()
        Get list of all poll titles
        Returns:
        list of poll titles

      • getQuestionList

        java.util.List<Question> getQuestionList​(java.util.List<QuestionEntity> questionEntity)
        Get list of questions based on list of question entities
        Parameters:
        questionEntity - list of question entities
        Returns:
        list of question dtos

      • getParticipants

        java.util.List<Participant> getParticipants​(java.util.List<ParticipantEntity> participantEntity)
        Get list of participants based on list of participant entities
        Parameters:
        participantEntity - list of participant entities
        Returns:
        list of participants

      • getItemList

        java.util.List<Item> getItemList​(java.util.List<ItemEntity> itemEntity)
        Get list of items based on list of item entities
        Parameters:
        itemEntity - list of item entities
        Returns:
        list of items

      • startPoll

        java.lang.String startPoll​(Poll poll)
        Starts a poll. Depending on the startdate it may skip the STARTED state and immediatly enters VOTING state. Also generates tokens for all participants and send emails containing the token values.
        Parameters:
        poll - poll to start
        Returns:
        started poll uuid

      • publishPoll

        java.lang.String publishPoll​(java.lang.String uuid)
        Publish a poll. It will only publish if the poll is FINISHED and at least 3 people voted. It will generate and store a result token for a poll and then send out emails with the result page link to all participants.
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuif of the poll that should be published
        Returns:
        uuid of published poll

      • sendReminders

        java.lang.String sendReminders​(java.lang.String uuid)
        Send reminders emails to all participants that still have a valid token related to that poll.
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuid of poll for which reminders should be sent
        Returns:
        uuid of poll

      • createToken

        void createToken​(PollEntity pollEntity)
        Creates and stores tokens for every participant of a poll
        Parameters:
        pollEntity - pollEntity for which tokens should be generated

      • createParticipantList

        ParticipantList createParticipantList​(java.lang.String Name,
                                      java.util.List<ParticipantInList> participants)
        Create and stores a participant list.
        Parameters:
        Name - name of participant list
        participants - list of participantInList that should be stored in list
        Returns:
        participantList

      • getParticipantList

        ParticipantList getParticipantList​(java.lang.String uuid)
        Get Participant list identified by uuid. Only list are considered that are owned by the current organizer.
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuid of participant list
        Returns:
        participantlist

      • getParticipantLists

        java.util.List<ParticipantList> getParticipantLists()
        Get all participant lists owned by current organizer.
        Returns:
        list of participantlists

      • storeParticipantList

        java.lang.String storeParticipantList​(ParticipantList participantList)
        Stores a participant list based on dto values
        Parameters:
        participantList - participant list dto
        Returns:
        uuid of stored participant list

      • deleteParticipantList

        boolean deleteParticipantList​(java.lang.String uuid)
        Delete participant list by uuid. Only participant lists that are owned by the current organizer are considered.
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuid of participant list
        Returns:
        true if successfully deleted
